targets.queryText:
WITH converted AS (
   SELECT Voltage, CAST(strftime('%s', DateTime) as integer) AS datetime FROM BmsReadings 
) 
SELECT Voltage, datetime FROM converted WHERE datetime BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds} order by datetime desc LIMIT 1
targets.rawQueryText:
WITH converted AS (
   SELECT Voltage, CAST(strftime('%s', DateTime) as integer) AS datetime FROM BmsReadings 
) 
SELECT Voltage, datetime FROM converted WHERE datetime BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds} order by datetime desc LIMIT 1

targets.queryText:
WITH converted AS (
   SELECT StateOfCharge as B1SOC, CAST(strftime('%s', DateTime) as integer) AS datetime FROM BatteryReadings where SlaveNumber = 0 
) 
SELECT B1SOC as 'Battery 1 SOC', datetime FROM converted WHERE datetime BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds} order by datetime desc LIMIT 1

targets.queryText:
-- select 
-- strftime('%s', DateTime) as timestamp,
-- CAST(BatteryVoltage AS FLOAT) as BV1
-- from BatteryReadings
-- where SlaveNumber = 0
WITH converted AS (
   -- a row looks like this (value, date): 1.45, '2020-12-12'
   SELECT BatteryVoltage as B1V,  CAST(strftime('%s', DateTime) as integer) AS datetime FROM BatteryReadings where SlaveNumber = 0
)
SELECT datetime, B1V FROM converted WHERE datetime BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
targets.rawQueryText:
-- select 
-- strftime('%s', DateTime) as timestamp,
-- CAST(BatteryVoltage AS FLOAT) as BV1
-- from BatteryReadings
-- where SlaveNumber = 0

   -- a row looks like this (value, date): 1.45, '2020-12-12'
   SELECT BatteryVoltage as B1V,  CAST(strftime('%s', DateTime) as integer) AS datetime FROM BatteryReadings where SlaveNumber = 0
)
SELECT datetime, B1V FROM converted WHERE datetime BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
